text: I actually didnt have any experience in the field of what im doing before starting the course other than i had a tour of a chemical plant. I dont think its that important provided you can demonstrate having some of the key skills required and have some experience working :grin: Have you done any work experience? I was a tennis coach which i think helped me to demonstrate leadership and ability to motivate others. Also do you think you would be interested in working in an office or lab type environment? What skills would you say you're strong on and what would you say you need to work on a bit more?
